hero.title: STAINLESS STEEL TABLES
hero.description: Engineered for perfection, crafted for eternity. Our stainless steel surfaces represent the ultimate fusion of industrial strength and refined aesthetics, designed to withstand the demands of professional use while maintaining their pristine appearance.

grade.title: GRADE 304 STAINLESS STEEL
grade.text: Premium austenitic stainless steel with superior corrosion resistance and exceptional durability.

finishing.title: PRECISION FINISHING
finishing.text: Multiple surface treatments available: brushed, mirror polish, satin, and custom textured patterns.

dimensions.title: CUSTOM DIMENSIONS
dimensions.text: Manufactured to exact specifications up to 3000mm length with precision edge finishing.

steelFronts.title: STEEL FURNITURE FRONTS
steelFronts.description: Authentic industrial aesthetics meet contemporary sophistication. Each steel front panel embodies the raw beauty of industrial materials while maintaining the refinement expected in luxury furniture applications.

handles.title: FURNITURE HANDLES
handles.description: Contemporary handle designs that combine ergonomic excellence with aesthetic sophistication. Each handle is precision-engineered for durability and comfort, available in five premium finishes to complement any furniture design vision.

boardsOverview.title: FURNITURE BOARDS
boardsOverview.description: Four distinctive product lines, each representing a unique approach to surface design and material innovation, complemented by our premium furniture handles collection.

metalux.title: METALUX SERIES
metalux.description: Advanced metallic finishes that create stunning visual depth and contemporary appeal.

woodsense.title: WOODSENSE SERIES
woodsense.description: Authentic wood aesthetics with the durability of engineered materials.

colorpro.title: COLORPRO SERIES
colorpro.description: Unlimited color possibilities with exceptional fade resistance and durability.

cta.title: CONFIGURE YOUR PROJECT
cta.description: Work with our specialists to create the perfect materials for your furniture designs.

hero.title: ENGINEERED BOARDS FOR PREMIUM INTERIORS
hero.description: Three distinctive series combining advanced materials technology with exceptional aesthetic appeal. Each board delivers superior performance while maintaining the refined elegance expected in luxury furniture applications.

introduction.title: ENGINEERED EXCELLENCE
introduction.text1: Our furniture board collection represents the pinnacle of material engineering, where cutting-edge technology meets sophisticated design. Each series offers unique aesthetic possibilities while maintaining exceptional durability and performance standards.
introduction.text2: From metallic sophistication to natural warmth and unlimited color expression, our boards provide the foundation for creating furniture that stands the test of time while making a lasting visual impact.

series.title: THREE DISTINCTIVE SERIES
series.description: Each series represents a unique approach to surface design, offering distinct aesthetic and functional benefits for different design visions and applications.

metalux.title: METALUX SERIES
metalux.description: Futuristic metallic finishes that create stunning visual depth and contemporary architectural presence. Perfect for modern interiors seeking sophisticated industrial aesthetics.

woodsense.title: WOODSENSE SERIES
woodsense.description: Authentic wood aesthetics with engineered durability. Captures the natural warmth and tactile appeal of premium timber while offering superior stability and consistency.

colorpro.title: COLORPRO SERIES
colorpro.description: Unlimited color possibilities with exceptional fade resistance. Bold chromatics and endless customization options for creating truly unique furniture pieces that make a statement.

stability.title: DIMENSIONAL STABILITY
stability.text: Superior resistance to warping, swelling, and dimensional changes across all environmental conditions.

finish.title: PREMIUM FINISH QUALITY
finish.text: Consistent surface quality with exceptional depth, clarity, and tactile appeal across all series.

edges.title: EDGE OPTIONS
edges.text: Multiple edge finishing options including matching, contrasting, and specialty treatments.

thickness.title: THICKNESS RANGE
thickness.text: Available in multiple thicknesses from 12mm to 25mm to suit various application requirements.

cta.title: EXPLORE SPECIFICATIONS
cta.description: Discover detailed specifications and configuration options for each series in our Material Studio, or contact our specialists for personalized guidance.

hero.title: PREMIUM FURNITURE HANDLES
hero.description: Precision-milled. Refined finishes. Built for daily use.

solid.title: SOLID ALUMINUM
solid.description: Precision-milled from a solid block of 6061-T6 aluminum, ensuring exceptional strength and refined finish.

finishes.title: REFINED FINISHES
finishes.description: Premium anodized and powder-coated surfaces that resist wear and maintain their beauty.

sizes.title: MULTIPLE SIZES
sizes.description: Comprehensive range of lengths and center-to-center options for every application.

leadTimes.title: FAST LEAD TIMES
leadTimes.description: Stock availability and efficient manufacturing for quick turnaround.

collection.description: Each handle is engineered for both form and function, available in multiple finishes and sizes.

applications.title: APPLICATIONS
applications.description: Our handles enhance both residential and commercial projects, from luxury kitchens to modern offices.

cta.title: NEED SAMPLES OR A QUOTE?
cta.description: Our team is ready to help you select the perfect handles. Request physical samples or a detailed quote.

hero.title: WARMTH OF WOOD. ENGINEERED DURABILITY.
hero.description: WoodSense series captures the authentic beauty of natural wood while delivering the consistency and performance of advanced engineered materials. Experience the tactile warmth and visual richness of premium timber without compromise.

categoryDescription.title: NATURAL AUTHENTICITY
categoryDescription.text1: The WoodSense series represents our commitment to capturing the essence of natural wood through advanced surface technology. Each finish is meticulously crafted to reproduce the subtle variations, grain patterns, and tactile qualities that make wood such a beloved material.
categoryDescription.text2: Unlike natural wood, WoodSense boards offer superior dimensional stability, consistent quality, and resistance to moisture and temperature fluctuations. This makes them ideal for applications where the beauty of wood is desired but environmental challenges exist.
categoryDescription.text3: Perfect for residential kitchens, hospitality environments, and commercial spaces where the warmth and comfort of natural wood enhance the human experience while maintaining practical performance.

palette.title: WOOD FINISHES
palette.description: A carefully curated selection of wood finishes, each capturing the unique character of premium timber species.

applications.title: APPLICATIONS
applications.description: WoodSense boards bring natural warmth to environments where comfort and authenticity are paramount.

specs.name: Surface Finish
specs.value: Advanced wood-grain reproduction with protective coating

specs.name: Edge Options
specs.value: Matching wood-grain, solid wood veneer, ABS

specs.name: Maintenance
specs.value: Standard wood cleaners, avoid abrasive materials

configure.title: CONFIGURE WOODSENSE
configure.description: Explore WoodSense configurations in our Material Studio or request detailed specifications and samples to experience the authentic wood feel firsthand.

hero.title: FUTURISTIC SHEEN. ARCHITECTURAL PRESENCE.
hero.description: The MetaLux series delivers sophisticated metallic finishes that transform furniture into architectural statements. Advanced surface technology creates depth and luminosity while maintaining exceptional scratch resistance and durability.

categoryDescription.title: METALLIC SOPHISTICATION
categoryDescription.text1: The MetaLux series represents the pinnacle of metallic surface technology, where advanced materials science meets contemporary design vision. Each finish captures and reflects light in unique ways, creating dynamic visual experiences that shift throughout the day.
categoryDescription.text2: Engineered for modern interiors that demand both aesthetic impact and functional performance, MetaLux boards offer outstanding scratch resistance and maintain their lustrous appearance even under intensive use.
categoryDescription.text3: Perfect for contemporary kitchens, luxury retail environments, and architectural installations where metallic sophistication creates an atmosphere of innovation and refinement.

palette.title: METALLIC FINISHES
palette.description: A curated selection of metallic finishes, each engineered to deliver consistent quality and distinctive character.

applications.title: APPLICATIONS
applications.description: MetaLux boards excel in environments where metallic sophistication enhances the overall design narrative.

specs.name: Surface Finish
specs.value: Advanced metallic coating with protective layer

specs.name: Maintenance
specs.value: Standard cleaning agents, microfiber cloth recommended

configure.title: CONFIGURE METALUX
configure.description: Explore MetaLux configurations in our Material Studio or request detailed specifications and samples from our technical specialists.

MLG25005L.title: Titanio Infinito

hero.title: BOLD CHROMATICS. ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION.
hero.description: The ColorPro series unleashes unlimited color possibilities with exceptional fade resistance and UV stability. Create furniture that makes bold statements while maintaining vibrant appearance for years to come.

categoryDescription.title: UNLIMITED EXPRESSION
categoryDescription.text1: The ColorPro series represents the ultimate in color freedom, where advanced pigment technology meets creative vision. With virtually unlimited color options, designers can achieve exact color matches, create custom palettes, or explore bold chromatic statements that define spaces.
categoryDescription.text2: Our advanced UV-stable coating system ensures that colors maintain their vibrancy and depth even under intensive light exposure. This makes ColorPro ideal for applications where color consistency and longevity are critical to the design's success.
categoryDescription.text3: Perfect for retail environments, hospitality spaces, and residential applications where color plays a central role in creating atmosphere, brand identity, or personal expression.

palette.title: COLOR PALETTE
palette.description: A curated selection showcasing the range of possibilities. Custom colors available to match any specification.
palette.extra: These represent just a fraction of available colors. Custom color matching available for any specification.

applications.title: APPLICATIONS
applications.description: ColorPro boards excel in environments where color creates identity, atmosphere, and emotional connection.

specs.name: Surface Finish
specs.value: UV-stable color coating with protective layer

configure.title: CONFIGURE COLORPRO
configure.description: Explore ColorPro configurations in our Material Studio or request custom color matching and samples to bring your color vision to life.
